name: Facundo Varela
title: Fullstack Developer
description: I love my job, I enjoy coding, I'm passionate about tech and new challenges. My goal is to improve teams by bringing a great set of soft-skills and the hunger of keep improving my technical skills ticket by ticket and day by day.

experiences.description: Development of a digital wallet oriented to the payment of services (TAP). Also Pency is web/app marketplace for small businesses.
experiences.stack: NextJS | ReactJS | React Native | NodeJS | Typescript | Chackra-UI | Firebase | PostgreSQL | MongoDB | Git

experiences.description: Development of a web/app for management of medical records and administration in ophthalmological centers.
experiences.stack: ReactJS | NodeJS | Typescript | Material-UI | Redux | Microservices | Express | PostgreSQL | Git

experiences.description: As a tutor in the React JS course, I accompanied the students academically, corrected deliverables, and gave classes when necessary.
Before entering the IT world, I worked as a cashier in several companies, with BBVA being the peak of my career. In the bank I performed treasury tasks and had up to 3 people in charge.
